about_the_game:
I tried to create an Unique - Game in 2023. I came up with this: You play as Sanyi, an avarage person knowing nothing about fighting or dueling. After a little journey he finds himself in a risky situation. He has to escape from a prison city wich is inside of a cave but the only way he can escape is by defeating all the champions of the city one-by-one in the Big Arena. As I mentioned he can't fight at all so he has to learn it. Each champion has their unique ability which Sanyi can learn when he defeats them. Sanyi is not the sharpest tool in the shed so he is only able to remember at 5 abilities at once so the player has to be extra coutious to decide wich ability he keeps/forgets. The game is still in developpment, but things such as your health has an effect on your movement is still in the making. The plan is that it will create a new game style:

Rough-Like
